name: Mikrocosmos (itch)
description:
English Description:
Language Support (so far): Chinese
This is a game that my team and I plan to develop in the long term. 

Mikrocosmos is a multi-player RTS game. Players take on the roles of arms dealers in the universe who purchase necessities, minerals, and weapons and supply them to the two sides in the ongoing cosmic war. The weapon resources the player sells can control the course of the war. In the end, the player wins by either increasing their affinity (the number of trades) with the winner of the battle or bankrupting the other players.

The game currently only supports a two-player local game. Two players use WSAD or arrow keys to control their ship. The bar above indicates the ongoing war process of the two sides. The values around your avatar represent your money and the number of trades you made with both factions. You can control your ship and stock up at the store below the screen, and sell a specific item by stopping on a planet that wishes to buy it. 

中文简介：
游戏语言:中文
这是我们团队计划长期开发的一个RTS游戏。

《Mikrocosmos》是一款多人RTS游戏。玩家在宇宙中扮演军火商的角色，购买必需品、矿物和武器，并提供给正在进行的宇宙战争的双方。玩家出售的武器资源可以控制战争的走向。最终玩家通过提升与战争胜利方的亲和度或者使另一位玩家破产以赢得胜利

游戏目前只支持双人本地游戏。两位玩家使用WSAD或方向键来控制飞船。游戏上面的条子显示了两个阵营正在进行的战争进程。头像两边的数字代表了你的金钱以及你与两个阵营所做的交易数量。玩家可以控制飞船并在屏幕下方的商店中进货，然后停留在想要购买对应物品的星球上进行出售。

Game made by: James Liu, Tim Chen, Sam Tian, May Chen, Alex Xu, Keyu Lu, Cathy Zhang, George Wang
